review: Doctor is easy to talk to. He explained every vaccine pretty well. Examined the child thoroughly. Highly recommended. I visited the doctor for my son’s vaccination.

review: He is much a nice doctor. I must say he is doing good job in his field.. the way he is explaining the things is better than others..

review: I was satisfied the way he treated my son in friendly manner n told me what is the reason after his growth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Toys to engage children were used creatively. Conversation with children was spontaneous and lively. Practical and pragmatic approach for health/height issues therby putting anxiety to rest.
Overall a great experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is a good child specialist, gives good time to evaluate child. Patiently listens to parents and plans his line of treatment as per his evaluation and condition of child.
